# Export results
In this section you export the results to a downloadable file for your team. 
>>>>>>> 51f05425df5e488a0435ce0890df3d652a6b95ff:18-export-result.Rmd

Head over to the Crabs workflow.

* Right click on the `PCA` step and choose `Add`

* Select `Export'

* Right click on the `Export` step and select `Run`

<center><img src="images/Click_on_export_run.png"></center>\

It has now been activated, showing a green status, exporting the data to "New Project" 

* Go to the "Crabs project" page by clicking it on the top bar

<center><img src="images/View_crabs_export_projectpage.png"></center>\

* Refresh the browser page either using `F5` or the refresh icon on the browser

The new `crabs workflow-Export` entry will appear.

You can download the data by clicking the download icon beside it. It is also available as a __Tercen__ **Table** (i.e. data set) and can be used by other workflows.
